common_issues.title: Shareable Links Generation Failure
common_issues.description: Users are unable to generate personal shareable links across multiple Pieces applications. This issue persists for an extended period, exceeding six months. Troubleshooting steps include investigating personal cloud configurations and implementing stability improvements. Despite these efforts, challenges persist, particularly with GitHub Gist generation.

related_issues.title: Unable to generate personal shareable links for 6+ months
related_issues.text:
Unable to generate personal shareable links for 6+ months
### Software

Desktop Application, Web Extension, VS Code, Sharing Web App

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

10.1.12

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I've been unable to generate shareable personal links and utilize the web sharing app since before June '24. I've created an issue about this twice before, and the last time was just completely disregarded and it was closed out.

Here is the screenshot from within my Pieces Desktop when trying to generate a personal link, as well as generate a GitHub Gist:

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/0966a1a9-3076-4d9b-9006-88a14673cc9f)
## Summary of GitHub Issue Conversation

**Key Points Raised:**

* Tombinga reported an issue with shareable links not working.
* This issue was causing frustration for users.
* Mark-at-pieces acknowledged the problem and offered to help.

**Problems Identified:**

* Shareable links were not functioning properly.
* Stale infrastructure was identified as the root cause.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* Mark-at-pieces offered to diagnose Tombinga's personal cloud and clean it up.
* A fix was implemented in the meantime to improve the stability of the feature.
* Major upgrades to shareable links and additional cloud features were planned for December.
* These upgrades were released in Pieces OS v11.0.3.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The initial issue reported by Tombinga seems to be resolved.
* However, Tombinga is still experiencing issues with generating GitHub Gists.
* Rutvik-at-pieces has requested further information to investigate the new issue.
* Om-Nandurkar is also experiencing the same issue.

**Additional Notes:**

* The issue with stale infrastructure was addressed in issue #1306 on the os_server repository.
* The upgrades to shareable links were released as part of Pieces OS v10.1.13.
* If users are still experiencing issues with shareable links, they are encouraged to reach out to the Pieces team for further assistance.

recommendations: **Investigate and resolve the root cause of shareable link generation failures:** This issue has been persistent for over six months and causes significant frustration for users. Prioritize identifying and addressing the underlying technical cause to prevent recurrence.

**Improve communication and transparency around ongoing issues:**  Acknowledge the shareable link problem publicly and provide regular updates on the progress of the fix. This can help manage user expectations and reduce repeated support requests.

**Review and optimize troubleshooting steps for common issues:** Ensure the provided troubleshooting steps for shareable link generation are comprehensive, up-to-date, and effective in resolving the problem. Consider creating dedicated help center articles or videos.

**Analyze user feedback from related issues:**  Thoroughly review feedback from users experiencing the shareable link issue, particularly those encountering difficulties with GitHub Gist generation. Identify any patterns or common factors that can help pinpoint the problem's root cause.

**Monitor the effectiveness of implemented solutions:** After deploying fixes, actively monitor the situation to ensure the issue is fully resolved and doesn't resurface. Gather user feedback to confirm the effectiveness of the solution.
